headline: Here's What Key Metrics Tell Us About McKesson (MCK) Q4 Earnings
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for McKesson (MCK) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended March 2025, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

raw.headline: Here's What Key Metrics Tell Us About McKesson (MCK) Q4 Earnings

headline: McKesson to spin off surgical supplies unit, forecasts strong annual profit
summary: Shares of the drug distributor rose 2% in extended trading.  The company said separation of the unit, which supplies surgical instruments and services, will allow it to focus on distribution of cancer drugs and other specialty medicines, which have shown higher growth and provide better margins.

raw.headline: McKesson to spin off surgical supplies unit, forecasts strong annual profit
raw.summary: Shares of the drug distributor rose 2% in extended trading.  The company said separation of the unit, which supplies surgical instruments and services, will allow it to focus on distribution of cancer drugs and other specialty medicines, which have shown higher growth and provide better margins.

headline: McKesson (NYSE:MCK) Misses Q1 Revenue Estimates
summary: Healthcare distributor and services company McKesson (NYSE:MCK) fell short of the market’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, but sales rose 18.9% year on year to $90.82 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $10.12 per share was 3% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.headline: McKesson (NYSE:MCK) Misses Q1 Revenue Estimates
raw.summary: Healthcare distributor and services company McKesson (NYSE:MCK) fell short of the market’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, but sales rose 18.9% year on year to $90.82 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $10.12 per share was 3% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: McKesson to Spin Off Medical-Surgical Company
summary: The pharmaceutical distributor said the new company would be a differentiated medical surgical supply and solutions business.

raw.headline: McKesson to Spin Off Medical-Surgical Company
raw.summary: The pharmaceutical distributor said the new company would be a differentiated medical surgical supply and solutions business.

headline: McKesson (MCK) Tops Q4 Earnings Estimates
summary: McKesson (MCK) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 3.16% and 3.08%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: McKesson (MCK) Tops Q4 Earnings Estimates
raw.summary: McKesson (MCK) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 3.16% and 3.08%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: McKesson: Fiscal Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: On a per-share basis, the Irving, Texas-based company said it had profit of $10.01. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, came to $10.12 per share. The results exceeded Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: McKesson: Fiscal Q4 Earnings Snapshot

headline: McKesson Reports Fiscal 2025 Fourth Quarter and Full Year Results and Provides Fiscal 2026 Guidance; Announces Intent to Separate Medical-Surgical Solutions
summary: IRVING, Texas, May 08, 2025--McKesson Corporation (NYSE: MCK) has released its fiscal 2025 fourth quarter financial results. Results can be accessed on McKesson’s Investor Relations website at investor.mckesson.com/financials/quarterly-results.
